name: Bitsy Rotation Demo
description:
Use arrows to move, q and e to rotate the room. Follow the hearts through the three rooms,
collect the little bouncing fellas.

Look behind walls and collect them all!

bitsy notes:

This project started as a tool to simply handle rotating the bitsy sprites.

Applying the same rotation functions to the room grids allow the room to easily be rotated in 90 degree turns as well. Next, by stacking multiple rooms with different palettes and a y offset, creates a rough but functional enough perspective trick that is full of fun weird quirks!

Source code for the game is available https://github.com/pinecone-dot-website/bitsy-rotation-demo/, and will be releasing the rotation library as a stand alone script at some point
